# lockBlock(requestFlags:blockNumber:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sends the Lock Block command (0x22 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
func lockBlock(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, blockNumber: UInt8, completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func lockBlock(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, blockNumber: UInt8) async throws
```

## Sending Single Block Commands

- **readSingleBlock(requestFlags:blockNumber:completionHandler:)**: Sends a Read Single Block command (0x20 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.
- **writeSingleBlock(requestFlags:blockNumber:dataBlock:completionHandler:)**: Sends the Write Single Block command (0x21 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.
